title: Colombo Municipal Council inaugural sitting on June 16
byline: The newly elected Colombo Municipal Council, following the conduct of the Local Government (LG) election on May 6, is scheduled to convene for its inaugural sitting on June 16, 2025.

title: English language should be a tool to broaden opportunities, not to widen social disparities – PM Harini
byline: Teaching English as a language should serve as a means to broaden opportunities, not as a tool to create social disparities, Prime Minister Dr. Harini Amarasuriya has stated.

title: Several spells of showers expected today
byline: Several spells of showers will occur in the Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central and North-western provinces and in the Galle and Matara districts today (04), the Department of Meteorology said.

title: Canada, US warn of air quality hazards as Canadian fire smoke reaches Europe
byline: Canada’s wildfires, which have already forced evacuations of more than 26,000 people, continued their stubborn spread on Tuesday (Jun 3), with heavy smoke choking millions of Canadians and Americans and reaching as far away as Europe.

title: Fire breaks out in a shop in Bokundara
byline: A fire has reportedly broken out in a shop located in Bokundara, Piliyandala.

title: Deputy PM of Australia concludes official visit to Sri Lanka
byline: Deputy Prime Minister and Minister for Defence of Australia Richard Marles has concluded his official visit to Sri Lanka and departed to India.

title: Deshabandu Tennakoon appears before inquiry committee in Parliament
byline: Suspended Inspector General of Police (IGP) Deshabandu Tennakoon has appeared before the three-member committee of inquiry, appointed to investigate and report on allegations of misconduct and serious abuse of office against him.

title: English should be a tool to broaden opportunities, not to widen social disparities – PM Harini
byline: Teaching English as a language should serve as a means to broaden opportunities, not as a tool to create social disparities, Prime Minister Dr. Harini Amarasuriya has stated.
